mapper.insert: insert into v_xy_zyfy (INP_NO, ITEM_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, PRICE, QTY, FEE_DATE) values (#{inpNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select INP_NO, ITEM_NO, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_NAME, PRICE, QTY, FEE_DATE from v_xy_zyfy
